plays.text: Penalty to Marcel Hossa 2 minutes for Hooking(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Steve Rucchin unassisted
Penalty to Konstantin Koltsov 2 minutes for Hooking Jaromir Jagr
Penalty to Brooks Orpik 2 minutes for Charging Petr Sykora
Penalty to Mark Recchi 2 minutes for Hooking(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Michal Rozsival 2 minutes for Hooking Konstantin Koltsov
Penalty to Michael Nylander 2 minutes for Hooking John LeClair
Goal scored by Mark Recchi assisted by Marc-Andre Fleury
Penalty to Sidney Crosby 2 minutes for Holding Michal Rozsival
Penalty to Colby Armstrong 2 minutes for Hooking Jaromir Jagr
Goal scored by Michal Rozsival assisted by Martin Straka AND Michael Nylander
Penalty to Darius Kasparaitis 2 minutes for Interference Michel Ouellet
Penalty to Sergei Gonchar 2 minutes for Holding Jason Strudwick
Penalty to John LeClair 2 minutes for Hooking Dominic Moore
Penalty to Martin Rucinsky 2 minutes for Interference Colby Armstrong
Penalty to Colby Armstrong 2 minutes for High Sticking Marek Malik
Goal scored by Petr Sykora assisted by Steve Rucchin AND Tom Poti
Penalty to Jason Ward 2 minutes for Hooking Konstantin Koltsov
Penalty to Ryan Whitney 2 minutes for Holding Ville Nieminen
